00046 double GoodyModel::getEvaluation(Vector<double> argument)
00047 {
00048    double evaluation = 0.0;
00049 
00050    int size = argument.getSize();
00051 
00052    if(size != numberOfVariables)
00053    {
00054       std::cout << std::endl
00055                 << "Error: GoodyModel class. "
00056                 << "double getEvaluation(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00057                 << "Size of argument must be equal to number of variables." << std::endl
00058                 << std::endl;
00059 
00060       std::cout << "Size of argument: " << size << std::endl
00061                 << "Number of variables: " << numberOfVariables <<std::endl;
00062 
00063       exit(1);
00064    }
00065 
00066    double c1 = argument[0];
00067    double c2 = argument[1];
00068    double c3 = argument[2];
00069 
00070    double delta = 0.0;
00071    double ue = 0.0;
00072 
00073    int numberOfSamples = 21;
00074 
00075 
00076    // Frequency
00077 
00078    Vector<double> frequency(numberOfSamples, 0.0);
00079 
00080    frequency[0] = 0.0;
00081    frequency[1] = 0.0;
00082    frequency[2] = 0.0;
00083    frequency[3] = 0.0;
00084    frequency[4] = 0.0;
00085    frequency[5] = 0.0;
00086    frequency[6] = 0.0;
00087    frequency[7] = 0.0;
00088    frequency[8] = 0.0;
00089    frequency[9] = 0.0;
00090    frequency[10] = 0.0;
00091    frequency[11] = 0.0;
00092    frequency[12] = 0.0;
00093    frequency[13] = 0.0;
00094    frequency[14] = 0.0;
00095    frequency[15] = 0.0;
00096    frequency[16] = 0.0;
00097    frequency[17] = 0.0;
00098    frequency[18] = 0.0;
00099    frequency[19] = 0.0;
00100    frequency[20] = 0.0;
00101 
00102    // Pressure spectrum data
00103 
00104    Vector<double> pressureSpectrumData(numberOfSamples, 0.0);
00105 
00106    pressureSpectrumData[0] = 0.0;
00107    pressureSpectrumData[1] = 0.0;
00108    pressureSpectrumData[2] = 0.0;
00109    pressureSpectrumData[3] = 0.0;
00110    pressureSpectrumData[4] = 0.0;
00111    pressureSpectrumData[5] = 0.0;
00112    pressureSpectrumData[6] = 0.0;
00113    pressureSpectrumData[7] = 0.0;
00114    pressureSpectrumData[8] = 0.0;
00115    pressureSpectrumData[9] = 0.0;
00116    pressureSpectrumData[10] = 0.0;
00117    pressureSpectrumData[11] = 0.0;
00118    pressureSpectrumData[12] = 0.0;
00119    pressureSpectrumData[13] = 0.0;
00120    pressureSpectrumData[14] = 0.0;
00121    pressureSpectrumData[15] = 0.0;
00122    pressureSpectrumData[16] = 0.0;
00123    pressureSpectrumData[17] = 0.0;
00124    pressureSpectrumData[18] = 0.0;
00125    pressureSpectrumData[19] = 0.0;
00126    pressureSpectrumData[20] = 0.0;
00127 
00128    // Pressure spectrum model
00129 
00130    Vector<double> pressureSpectrumModel(numberOfSamples, 0.0);
00131 
00132    double numerator = 0.0;
00133    double denominator = 0.0;
00134 
00135    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00136    {
00137       numerator = c2*pow(frequency[i]*delta/ue, 2.0);
00138       denominator = pow(pow(frequency[i]*delta/ue, 0.75)+c1, 3.7)
00139                   + pow(c3*frequency[i]*delta/ue, 7.0);
00140 
00141       pressureSpectrumModel[i] = numerator/denominator;
00142    }
00143 
00144    // Sum of squares error
00145 
00146    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00147    {
00148       evaluation += pow(pressureSpectrumModel[i]-pressureSpectrumData[i], 2.0);
00149    }
00150 
00151    evaluation = 1.0;
00152 
00153    return(evaluation);
00154 }

00157 // Vector<double> getGradient(void)
00158 //
00165 
00166 Vector<double> GoodyModel::getGradient(Vector<double> argument)
00167 {
00168    Vector<double> gradient(numberOfVariables, 0.0);
00169 
00170    double evaluation1 = 0.0, evaluation2 = 0.0;
00171 
00172    for (int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00173    {
00174       // Add epsilon to argument
00175 
00176       argument[i] += epsilon;
00177 
00178       // Get evaluation
00179 
00180       evaluation2 = getEvaluation(argument);
00181 
00182       // Restart original argument
00183 
00184       argument[i] -= epsilon;
00185 
00186       // Substract epsilon from argument
00187 
00188       argument[i] -= epsilon;
00189 
00190       // Get evaluation
00191 
00192       evaluation1 = getEvaluation(argument);
00193 
00194       // Restart original argument
00195 
00196       argument[i] += epsilon;
00197 
00198       // Calculate derivative
00199 
00200       gradient[i] = (evaluation2 - evaluation1)/(2.0*epsilon);
00201    }
00202 
00203    return(gradient);
00204 }

00207 // Matrix<double> getHessian(Vector<double>) method
00208 
00209 Matrix<double> GoodyModel::getHessian(Vector<double> argument)
00210 {
00211    Matrix<double> Hessian(numberOfVariables, numberOfVariables, 0.0);
00212 
00213    return(Hessian);
00214 }
00215 
00216 
00217 // Matrix<double> getHessian2(Vector<double>)
00218 
00219 Matrix<double> GoodyModel::getHessian2(Vector<double> argument)
00220 {
00221    Matrix<double> Hessian(numberOfVariables, numberOfVariables, 0.0);
00222 
00223    Vector<double> gradient1(numberOfVariables, 0.0);
00224    Vector<double> gradient2(numberOfVariables, 0.0);
00225 
00226    // Obtain the Hessian matrix
00227 
00228    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00229    {
00230       // Add epsilon to variable i
00231 
00232       argument[i] += epsilon;
00233 
00234       // Calculate gradient
00235 
00236       gradient2 = getGradient(argument);
00237 
00238       // Restart variable i
00239 
00240       argument[i] -= epsilon;
00241 
00242       // Substract epsilon variable i
00243 
00244       argument[i] -= epsilon;
00245 
00246       // Calculate gradient
00247 
00248       gradient1 = getGradient(argument);
00249 
00250       // Restart variable i
00251 
00252       argument[i] += epsilon;
00253 
00254       // Calculate second derivative
00255 
00256       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfVariables; j++)
00257       {
00258          Hessian[i][j] = (gradient2[j] - gradient1[j])/(2.0*epsilon);
00259       }
00260    }
00261 
00262    return(Hessian);
00263 }
00264

00266 // Matrix<double> getInverseHessian(Vector<double>) method
00267 
00268 Matrix<double> GoodyModel::getInverseHessian(Vector<double>)
00269 {
00270    Matrix<double> inverseHessian(numberOfVariables, numberOfVariables, 0.0);
00271 
00272    return(inverseHessian);
00273 }
